content: निक्षेपः {@--1@} Throwing or casting on (with <ab>acc.</ab>); अलं मान्यानां व्याख्यानेषु कटाक्षनिक्षेपेण <ls>S. D. 2.</ls> {@--2@} A deposit, pledge; pawn in general; <ls>Pt. 1. 14</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 4.</ls> {@--3@} Anything deposited without a seal in trust or as a compensation, an open deposit; समक्षं तु निक्षेपणं निक्षेपः <ls>Mit.</ls> on <ls>Y. 2. 67.</ls> {@--4@} Sending away. {@--5@} Throwing away, abandoning. {@--6@} Wiping, drying.
